type ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement = class inherit TransportBindingElement interface IPolicyExportExtension interface IWsdlExportExtension

summary.span: 一个抽象类，可以向基 补充面向连接的传输（如 TCP 和命名管道）所通用的其他属性。

span.span: An abstract class that supplements the base with additional properties that are common to connection-oriented transports such as TCP and named pipes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该类已编入文档，以全面了解传输层次结构，希望不要对其进行直接调用。This class is documented to give a more complete understanding of the transports hierarchy and is not expected to be directly called. 构造函数供内部使用，避免直接构造和调用。The constructor is internal to avoid direct construction and invocation. 该绑定元素的公共属性可从派生类 与 中调用。The public properties of this binding element can be called from the derived classes and .

returns.span: 如果可以生成通道工厂，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a channel factory can be built; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在尝试创建通道工厂之前应调用此方法。You should call this method before trying to create a channel factory. 如果 `TChannel` 为 ，此方法仅在缓冲模式下返回 `true`。If `TChannel` is this method returns `true` only when in buffered mode. 如果 `TChannel` 为 ，此方法仅在流模式下返回 `true`。If `TChannel` is this method returns `true` only when in streaming mode.

summary.span: 获取或设置确定通道在断开连接前可处于初始化状态的最长时间的 。

span.span: Gets or sets a that determines the maximum time a channel can be in the initialization status before being disconnected.

value.span: 一个 ，在其之后的通道初始化请求就会超时。

span.span: A after which a channel initialization request times out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可确定 TCP 连接使用 .NET 组帧协议对自身进行身份验证所需的时间。This property determines how long a TCP connection can take to authenticate itself using the .NET Framing protocol. 客户端需要发送一些初始数据，然后服务器才有足够的信息来执行身份验证。A client needs to send some initial data before the server has enough information to perform authentication. 此超时被有意设置为小于 ReceiveTimeout（10 分钟），这样，未经身份验证的恶意客户端就无法长时间保持绑到该服务器的连接。This timeout is intentionally made smaller than the ReceiveTimeout (10 min) so that malicious unauthenticated clients do not keep the connections tied up to the server for long. 默认值为 30 秒。The default value is 30 seconds.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于从客户端或服务传输网络上的序列化消息块的缓冲区大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the buffer used to transmit a chunk of the serialized message on the wire from the client or service.
The size of the connection buffer.
The default value is 8192 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以更改此值以根据平均消息大小和交换模式提供更佳的吞吐量。This value can be changed to provide better throughput based on average message sizes and exchange patterns.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

The binding context.

summary.span: 从绑定堆栈中获取属性（如果存在）。

span.span: Gets properties from the binding stack, if present.

returns.span: 绑定堆栈中的一个 对象（如果存在）。

span.span: A object from the binding stack, if present.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法接收绑定上下文作为输入参数，该参数表示绑定元素的堆栈。This method receives a binding context as an input parameter, which represents the stack of binding elements. 堆栈中的每个绑定元素都可以独立处理查询、委托查询，或两种功能都具备。Each binding element in the stack can handle the inquiry itself, delegate the inquiry, or a combination of the two. 如果委托查询，每个绑定元素都可以修改上下文。Each binding element can modify the context if it delegates the inquiry. 但是，传输绑定元素独立处理查询。However, a transport binding element handles the inquiry itself. 此方法由绑定元素以及运行时对象（例如 、 和 ）实现。This method is implemented by binding elements as well as by the run-time objects such as , , and .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在对 URI 进行匹配时，是否使用主机名来访问服务。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching on the URI.

value.span: 值，该值指示在将传入的请求路由到终结点 URI 时，是否包含主机名。

span.span: The value that indicates whether the hostname is included when routing incoming requests to an endpoint URI.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示在比较过程中忽略主机名与端口号。

span.span: The default value is , which ignores the hostname and port number in the comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关值及其说明的更多信息，请参见 枚举。See the enumeration for further values and their descriptions.

span.span: The value is not a valid .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxBufferSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要使用的缓冲区的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer to use.

summary.span: 对于经过流处理的消息，该值最少应为以缓冲模式读取的消息头的最大可能大小。

span.span: For streamed messages, this value should be at least the maximum possible size of the message headers, which are read in buffered mode.

value.span: 内存中用于对传入消息进行缓冲的最大字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory.
The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于经过流处理的消息，该属性仅适用于消息头；对于缓冲的消息，该属性适用于整个消息。For streamed messages this property only applies to the message headers; for buffered messages it applies to the entire message. 此属性的值必须小于或等于 ，且必须大于消息头的大小，否则通道会引发异常。The value of this property must be less than or equal to and must be larger than the size of the headers of the message or the channel throws an exception. 如果接收的数据量大于可缓冲的数据量，则通道会引发 ，其中包含 作为内部异常。If you receive more data than you can buffer the channel throws a , which contains a as an inner exception.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

summary.span: 获取或设置消息块或完整消息在发出之前可以在内存中保持缓冲的最大时间间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum interval of time that a chunk of a message or a full message can remain buffered in memory before being sent out.

value.span: 一个 ，指定消息块或完整消息在发出之前可以在内存中保持缓冲的最大时间间隔。默认值为2秒。

span.span: A that specifies the maximum interval of time that a chunk of a message or a full message can remain buffered in memory before being sent out. The default value is 2 seconds.

value.span: 只有在传出消息的 属性设置为 时，该属性才有意义。

span.span: This property is only meaningful if the property of an outgoing message is set to .

value.span: 否则，该值就会被忽略，消息将立即发送。

span.span: Otherwise, this value is ignored and messages are sent immediately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `false`，就会忽略此消息的该属性。If is `false` then this property is ignored for that message.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxPendingAccepts { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxPendingAccepts : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置服务可等待许可证处理至服务的传入连接的最大通道数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of channels a service can have waiting on a listener for processing incoming connections to the service.

value.span: 服务可拥有的侦听器上正在等待的最大通道数。

span.span: The maximum number of channels a service can have waiting on a listener.

value.span: 属性的默认值为 2 \* 处理器数。

span.span: The default value is 2 \* number of processors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性会限制服务器可具有的等待侦听器的通道数目。This property limits the number of channels that the server can have waiting on a listener. 当 MaxPendingAccepts 太低时，会有一个较小的时间间隔，在此间隔内，所有等待的通道都已开始服务连接，但没有新通道已开始侦听。When MaxPendingAccepts is too low, there will be a small interval of time in which all of the waiting channels have started servicing connections, but no new channels have begun listening. 连接可在此间隔内到达，但将会因服务器上没有等待它的内容而失败。A connection can arrive during this interval and will fail because nothing is waiting for it on the server. 可通过将 属性设置为较大的数字来配置此属性。This property can be configured by setting the property to a larger number.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

summary.span: 获取或设置在服务上等待调度的最大连接数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections awaiting dispatch on the service.

value.span: 在服务上等待调度的最大入站连接数。

span.span: The maximum number of inbound connections awaiting dispatch on the service.

value.span: 默认值为 12 \* 处理器数。

span.span: The default value is 12 \* number of processors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性控制一个传输已接受但 ServiceModel 调度程序尚未选取的连接的数目。This property controls how many connections a transport has accepted but have not been picked up by the ServiceModel Dispatcher. 若要设置此值，请对该绑定使用 `MaxConnections` 或对该绑定元素使用 `maxOutboundConnectionsPerEndpoint`。To set this value, use `MaxConnections` on the binding or `maxOutboundConnectionsPerEndpoint` on the binding element. 当堆栈中的高层调用 `AcceptDispatch` 时，该连接就会从等待调度的连接队列中移除。When a higher layer in the stack calls `AcceptDispatch`, that connection is removed from the queue of connections awaiting dispatch.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

Sub ExportPolicy (exporter As MetadataExporter, context As PolicyConversionContext) Implements IPolicyExportExtension.ExportPolicy

param.name: exporter
param.span: 可以用来修改导出过程的 。

span.span: The that you can use to modify the exporting process.

param.name: context
param.span: 可以用来插入您的自定义策略断言的 。

span.span: The that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.

summary.span: 导出有关绑定的自定义策略断言。

span.span: Exports a custom policy assertion about bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将与绑定相关的语句写入特定协定公开的 WSDL 信息，并由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 用于与客户端通信，以便在绑定堆栈中存在此自定义绑定元素。This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack. 此方法接受两个参数： 和 对象。This method takes two parameters: the and objects. 使用 , 和 方法以获取从不同范围导出的策略断言的集合。Use the , , and methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes. 然后，使用此方法将您自己的策略断言添加到适当的集合中。Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection. 属性可公开正在导出的终结点的 。The property exposes the for the endpoint that is being exported. 这样，此方法就可正确限定它们的导出策略断言的范围。This allows this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions. 例如，代码中的安全属性可以将行为添加到指示安全策略断言应该添加到的位置的 。For example, security attributes in code may add behaviors to the that indicate where security policy assertions should be added. 一旦将自定义策略断言附加到 WSDL 信息，客户端就可以通过实现 接口来检测和导入自定义绑定断言。Once custom policy assertions have been attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an interface.

span.span: or is .

The default is .
